text: The Socialist Republic of Serbia (), known as the People's Republic of Serbia () until 1963, was one of the six constituent republics of the Socialist Federal Republic of Yugoslavia. It became a federated republic of Yugoslavia in 1944. It included what is now Serbia and Kosovo. title: Socialist Republic of Serbia
